#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

#define lli long long
#define mp make_pair
#define pb push_back
#define gc getchar_unlocked

vector<int> primes;
const int limit = 1000001;
bool isprime[limit];

void seive(){
	for(lli i=2;i<limit;i++){
		if(!isprime[i]){
			primes.pb(i);
			for(lli j=i*i;j<limit;j+=i)
				isprime[j]=true;
		}
	}
}

int main(){
	seive();
	lli n,pn,p,q;
	int t;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--){
		scanf("%lld %lld",&n,&pn);
		for(int i=0;i<primes.size();i++){
			p = (long long)(primes[i]);
			if(n%p != 0) continue;
			
			lli upto = 1LL;
			while(n%p==0){
				n=n/p;
				printf("%lld ",p);
				upto *= p;
			}
			upto /= p;
			pn = pn/upto;
			pn = pn/(p-1);
		}
		if(n==1){
			printf("\n");
			continue;
		}
		if(pn == (n-1)){
			printf("%lld\n",n);
			continue;
		}
		p = sqrt(n);
		if(p*p==n){
			printf("%lld %lld\n",p,p);
			continue;
		}
		double d=n-pn+1;
		p=(d+(lli)(sqrt(d*d-4*n)))/2;
		q=n/p;
		if(p>q){
			lli temp = p;
			p=q;
			q=temp;
		}
		printf("%lld %lld\n",p,q);
	}
}
